title: Kęsice
content:
Kęsice [kɛ̃ˈɕit͡sɛ] is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Zawidz, within Sierpc County, Masovian Voivodeship, in east-central Poland.[1] It lies approximately 7 km (4 mi) west of Zawidz, 12 km (7 mi) south-east of Sierpc, and 106 km (66 mi) north-west of Warsaw.

This Sierpc County location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
